abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Katherine Luna Mateo of Brooklyn pay for her rent and utility bills.

headline.print_headline: Falling Behind on the Bills as Her Son’s Needs Mount
headline.main: Falling Behind on Bills as Her Son’s Needs Intensify

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: When Katherine Mateo’s son, who has autism, is too sick or unruly to attend his special school, she must remain with him at home instead of reporting to work, losing much-needed income.
lead_paragraph: When Katherine Mateo’s son, who has autism, is too sick or unruly to attend his special school, she must remain with him at home instead of reporting to work, losing much-needed income.
